name: Substrate provided as per manufacturer's requirements
All pipes and wastes to be grouted firm,
Sheet gaps are no greater than 10mm
Substrate is scraped free from concrete/Plaster
Substrate is Vacuumed/Broomed clean, smooth, firm, continuous surface and free from loose or foreign matter
Prime all surfaces with Silcor Primer BS or Epocote F100W Clear Primer
Fill any penetrations / voids flush to ensure a continuous surface, apply coving fillet of Polyurethane sealant to all upstands and pipe collars
GCP Silcor 560 HB at 1.5mm WFT measured using Wet Film Gauge
Continuous membrane over all surfaces in 1 or 2 coats
Apply Coreflute to all surfaces receiving membrane
Nail only at top edge or when raising a wall, nails must be removed
Check surface for defects in the membrane, make repairs as necessary and document
